segments.text: I heard Nick found a job in a bank and his salary is said very high . I also want to work there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Will this do ? Your major is not related to banking , as you know .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know that , but making a lot of money makes me crazy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Money is not the only standard to decide your career . In fact , there are more important things you can refer to when evaluating your career . If I were you , I would choose one I like to do .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Actually , I am afraid I will be stuck in the job forever , if I choose a bad one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't worry . We can always change our careers , when we are unsatisfied with them .
segments.speaker: S2
